property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature school and Level 1 of the Water School. Fire and War spells cost triple.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Spreading Vines: During the Deployment Phase, you may place a Vine marker in a zone. Whenever you, or an object you control, casts a Vine spell, you may target a zone containing a friendly Vine marker, or target an object in that zone, or a border of that zone. Then, destroy that marker. TREEBOND: When a friend tree conjuration comes into play you may choose to bond with it. Place your Treebond marker on it, You gain Innate Life +4 and Channel +1. The gains Innate Life +4, Armor +1, and Lifebond +2. If the tree is destroyed, the Treebond marker is permanently destroyed.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark School of Magic. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Plague Master: The Necromancer has the Poison Immunity trait. During the Upkeep Phase, for each object with one or more poison condition markers on it. the Necromancer may pay 1 mana to place 1 direct poison damage on that object. Eternal Servant: When a friendly non-Legendary, non-Epic, undead creature comes into play, you may make it your Eternal Servant. Its attacks gain Piercing +1. Place the Eternal Servant marker on it. If this creature is destroyed, you may pay mana equal to its casting cost to Reanimate it. You may place the marker on this creature again when it comes into play, or save it to reassign.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark School of Magic. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Plague Master: The Necromancer has the Poison Immunity trait. During the Upkeep Phase, for each object with one or more poison condition markers on it. the Necromancer may pay 1 mana to place 1 direct poison damage on that object. Eternal Servant: When a friendly non-Legendary, non-Epic, undead creature comes into play, you may make it your Eternal Servant. Its attacks gain Piercing +1. Place the Eternal Servant marker on it. If this creature is destroyed, you may pay mana equal to its casting cost to Reanimate it. You may place the marker on this creature again when it comes into play, or save it to reassign.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark School of Magic. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Plague Master: The Necromancer has the Poison Immunity trait. During the Upkeep Phase, for each object with one or more poison condition markers on it. the Necromancer may pay 1 mana to place 1 direct poison damage on that object. Eternal Servant: When a friendly non-Legendary, non-Epic, undead creature comes into play, you may make it your Eternal Servant. Its attacks gain Piercing +1. Place the Eternal Servant marker on it. If this creature is destroyed, you may pay mana equal to its casting cost to Reanimate it. You may place the marker on this creature again when it comes into play, or save it to reassign.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever an enemy Corporeal creature is destroyed, place a Skull token on Altar. Once per round, as a full action, a friendly cleric creature in Altar's zone may place a Skull token on Altar. While Altar has 8 or more Skull tokens, it gains Lifebond +2, all Living creatures gain Finite Life, and during the Upkeep Phase each Living creatures receives 2 direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Orchid's attack targets a Mage, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token, choose an equipment object on that Mage, and pay its casting cost to destroy that object.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Unique, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living

property.name: Text
property.value: All other Living creatures and conjurations gain Innate Life +2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Lightning Immunity, Burnproof, Epic, Necromancer Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Graveyard may summon one Dark Nonliving creature. The first time each round that a creature is destroyed, you may place mana equal to its Level on Graveyard.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Legendary, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in Mohktari's zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Lotus's attack targets a Living non-Mage creature, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token and pay mana equal to that creature's Level +2 to place a Sleep condition marker on that creature.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Druid Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, if there is 3 or more mana on Seedling Pod, it may cast 1 plant creature or conjuration which targets its zone, an object on its zone, or a border of its zone. It it does, destroy Seedling Pod.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living, Druid Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Seedling Pod spells gain the Cantrip trait. During the Deployment Phase, Samara Tree may cast 1 Seedling Pod spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained and gains the Unmovable trait. Each Upkeep Phase, before paying Stranglevine's upkeep cost, place 1 Crush token on Stranglevine. X = the number of Crush tokens on Stranglevine. When you pay Stranglevine's Upkeep cost, this creature receives X direct damage. Stranglevine gains Life +2X. Stranglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Stranglevine. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained and gains the Unmovable trait. Tanglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Tanglevine. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living, Druid Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, you may pay 1 mana to place 1 additional Vine marker with your Spreading Vines ability. During the Deployment Phase, Vine Tree may cast 1 vine creature or conjuration spell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Dark Mage Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: When a friendly zombie creature destroys a Living non-Epic creature with a melee attack, you may pay half that creature's cast cost (rounded up) to Reanimate it. When the creature comes into play, place a Zombie condition marker on it, and place damage on it equal to its Level.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Passage Attacks, Extendable

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Sacrificial Knife: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] Repair Bones: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Reconstruct 2 damage from target skeleton object.] Vigor of the Grave: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Target zombie creature gains the Melee +1 trait until end of round.]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resilient, Uncontainable, Nonliving, Slow, Psychic Immunity, Acid Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever Devouring Jelly attacks and damages a Corporeal creature, it may Reconstruct up to 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of taking a move action, Grey Wraith may pay 1 mana to teleport to an adjacent zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ichthellid comes into play with an egg token on it. When Ichthellid's attack damages, but does not destroy, a Living creature, you may pay 1 mana and remove the egg token to an Ichthellid Larva marker on that creature.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Legendary, Nature Mage Only, Epic, Regenerate 2, Hydro Immunity, Flame +2

property.name: Text
property.value: When Kralathor attacks and devours a Corporeal creature, it places a Growth marker on itself.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, each friendly skeleton object, in or bordering Mort's zone, may Reconstruct up to 2 damage.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Lumbering, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Text
property.value: When Unstable Zombie is activated, it may choose on the following: Remove up to 2 damage from itself, its attacks gain Piercing +2 until end of round, or it loses the Lumbering trait until end of round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Lumbering, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Text
property.value: When Plague Zombie is destroyed, place a Rot condition on each Living creature in its

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rooted, Uproot 1, Regenerate 1, Hydro Immunity, Flame +2

property.name: Text
property.value: If a Corporeal creature was destroyed this round, and Ravenous Ghoul is in (or moves to) the zone it was destroyed in, as a quick action it may take that creature from its discard pile and remove it from the game to gain a Growth marker.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Lumbering, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving, Legendary

property.name: Text
property.value: When Shaggoth-Zora is activated, it may Obliterate 1 friendly zombie creature in its zone to place a Growth marker on itself. It can have a maximum of 6 Growth markers.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a quick action, Tataree may choose and do one of the following to a plant object in its zone; Heal it 1 damage, or place 1 mana on it (if it has the Channel attribute).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rooted, Uproot 2, Vigilant, Intercept, Flame +2, Regenerate 2, Hydro Immunity, Legendary

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Lumbering, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +2, Lumbering, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Slow, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +1, Lumbering, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, you may pay half its casting cost (rounded up) to Reanimate it. When the creature comes into play, place a Zombie condition marker on it, and place damage on it equal to its Level

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may reveal Stumble. If you do, the creature can't take a move action until the end of its Action Phase. Then, destroy Stumble. Has no effect on creatures with the Unmovable or Uncontainable trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Obscured and Light -2 traits. [Obscured] [Light -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Up to twice per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he, or a spawnpoint he controls, casts or reveals a necro or undead spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Necro/Undead] [x2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick necro spell, you may pay 2 mana to target a zone up to 1 zone away. All friendly undead creatures in that zone gain Melee +1 until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a plant spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Plant] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Libro Mortuos may summon one undead creature into your zone. If Libro Mortuos is destroyed, you may lose 3 Life to return it to your spellbook instead of the discard pile.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Mohktari's Touch: [Cost=X] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Remove 1 condition marker from target plant object (pay its removal cost). If you do, you may heal it 1 damage.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may cast the above quick spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this Mage is attacked, at the end of the Roll Dice Step, he may convert up to 2 critical damage to normal damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a quick spell, you may pay 1 mana to place a Vine Marker in a target zone up to 1 zone away. Once per round, as a quick spell, you may pay 4 mana and destroy a target friendly Vine marker up to 2 zones away, to give a target non-flying creature in that zone the Stuck condition.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Healing Light: [Cost=2] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Heal] [Dice=2] [Heal target Living creature the amount rolled.] Cleansing Light: [Cost=X] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Remove 1 Condition marker from target Living creature. X = its removal cost.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may cast one of the 2 quick spells shown above.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Meditate: [Full] [Add 3 mana to your mana supply.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a non-Epic Living creature from any discard pile, and Summon it into your zone. Place damage on that creature equal to its Level. Place a Zombie marker on this creature. X = half the creatures casting cost (rounded up).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target friendly vine marker makes the above attack. Then, destroy that vine marker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roll 6 attack dice. Target skeleton object may Reconstruct up to that much damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove all Burn condition markers from all objects. All friendly Living objects may heal up to 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each friendly skeleton object in the arena rolls 6 attack dice and may Reconstruct up to that much damage (roll separately for each object).

property.name: Text
property.value: Until the end of the round, all zombie creatures in the arena lose the Lumbering, Slow, and Pest traits, and gain the Fast and Bloodthirsty +1 traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target revealed enchantment. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost)

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. Destroy the chosen equipment. X = equipment's casting cost
